summary.p: 4 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 21/2; Qurʾānic Text: Q 29:8-30:24; 11 lines per page; Dimensions: 288 x 165/170mm; Script style: kūfī A.II (?).

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 21
Contains fragments of two manuscripts.
12 fol.
Traces of old repair: upper and lower edges possibly have been cropped.
Old accession number: A. 21 (according to Langlois’ inventory).

Fol. 9–12. 165/170×288 mm (1.75/1.694). Support: thick semitransparent parchment, of darkish color. Writing material: light brown ink.
Collation: fragment of one quire, consist of two bifolia.
H9F F10H / H11F F12H
Text layout: 135×240 mm (1.777), 11 lines. Ruling: with a hard-point tool, punctures on the outer margins. Script: A II?. Diacritics: dots in the same ink as the main text. Vocalization: absent.

Verse markers: for individual verses – diagonal dashes (type1.1.3) in the same ink as the main text; for groups of five verses – circles in black ink (type тип 1.А.1) over the markers of individual verses; for groups of ten verses – circles (type1.D.I) in red paint and black ink over the markers of individual verses (fol. 9r, 10r).
The blank part of the last line of surah 29 (fol. 11v) is filled with two rows of dots.
Surah 40 begins on fol. 12r with a basmala.
Stitching: fragments of threads have been preserved in the punctures of the folds.
Defects: stains, traces of rubbing; upper edges have darkened (damaged by faire?).
Contents:
Fol. 9r–11v. Surah 29, verses 7(8)-69(69)*. Incipit: [يعملون] ووصينا الانسانَ.
Fol. 12r–12v. Surah 30, verses 1(1)-23(24). Explicit: لقومٍ [يعقلون] ."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
